## Title
U6523-244612 - Subscription Agent Services {#title}

### Tender Description {#tenderdescription}
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Industry (ISED), invites interested firms to bid on a Supply Arrangement E60PI-23AGNT B for Subscription Agent Services.

The requirement is to provide services for the acquisition of subscriptions to publications of all types and media, including traditional print material and electronic content hosted remotely by a publisher. The Subscription Agent will also be responsible for delivering, managing, and providing related support for these subscriptions, as well as accessing the Electronic Resource Management Platform.

The proposed contract period is one year from the contract award date, with two one-year option periods. 

## Instructions to Respondents {#instructions-to-respondents}
To submit a proposal, respondents should contact the contracting authority to request an e-Sourcing Module (eSM) invitation to bid. 

All bids must be submitted by 2024-02-13 (14:00 EST) for consideration. Incomplete or late submissions will not be accepted.

## Important Dates {#important-dates}
* Tender closing date: 2024-02-13 (14:00 EST)
* Contract expected start date: 2024-01-15
* Contract expected end date: 2024-12-31

## Eligibility Criteria {#eligibility-criteria}
Only firms that have been previously invited to participate in the Supply Arrangement E60PI-23AGNT B are eligible to bid on this requirement.

## Contact Information {#contact-information}
For more information or to request an e-Sourcing Module (eSM) invitation to bid, please contact Matthew Curran (matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Contracting Authority {#contracting-authority}
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Canada
